name: Login with email address containing spaces
description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with an email address containing spaces.
steps: Step 1: Enter an email address containing spaces into the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter a valid password into the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: An error message should be displayed indicating that the email address is invalid.

elements.description: Username or email address input field
